title: What are the solutions for Temperature Inversion? - Quora

response.answer_text: I find myself at a loss about this. First of all, I assume we are talking about the meteorological phenomenon of temperature which caps off convection circulation Temperature Inversion (C) charlie kennedy  The best example I know -and remember, because it killed some of my relatives, is the 1952 smog in London. Great Smog of London - Wikipedia This is a major weather event. There can be no solutions that prevent the inversion occurring. We can't manipulate the weather. What is within our power avoid the consequences. What happened in the UK was the passing of the clean air act, which banned the use of coal as a domestic fuel (I really miss it) and started the trend to Domestic central heating. The work continues with the recent introduction of control zones for commercial vehicles. And the removal of major industry to less vulnerable locations. We know that air can get trapped. It is a powerful incentive to do summat that we should do anyway, to reduce or eliminate emissions. A tree above the clouds (C) Karl and Ali
